    fmi2

    R client package for the Finnish Meteorological Institute (FMI) open data API. fmi2 provides access to a subset of the FMI download service, please have a look at XXX what is currently supported. More data sets and queries may be wrapped in the future.

    All data from the FMI is released under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license.

    Installation

    fmi2 is not yet on CRAN, but you can install it from GitHub with:

    install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("ropengov/fmi2")

    Example

    This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

    ## basic example code

    For a list of currently available data sets and queries, see XXX.
